original: de la 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun par gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ster rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khro bsgom /
analyzed: de la 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun par gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ster rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khro bsgom /
translated: There, the yogī who wishes to accomplish Mañjuśrī Yamarī should go to a charnel ground or similar place that is pleasing to the mind, sit on a comfortable seat, and imagine a sun maṇḍala in his heart.

original: de'i dbus su h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba bsgom /
analyzed: de'i dbus su h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba bsgom /
translated: In its center, he should meditate on a dark-blue hūṃ that blazes intensely.

original: de las 'od 'phros pas bar chad thams cad srung zhing bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskur te /
analyzed: de las 'od 'phros pas bar chad thams cad srung zhing bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskur te /
translated: Light radiates from that, protecting against all obstacles and invoking the wisdom minds of the sugatas.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
translated: Invite all the buddhas and bodhisattvas to the space in front of you.

original: yan lag bdun pa bya zhing tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te de ni sbod nams kyi tshogs bsag go //
analyzed: yan lag bdun pa bya zhing tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te de ni sbod nams kyi tshogs bsag go //
translated: Perform the seven-limb practice and meditate on the four immeasurables. This is the accumulation of the merit collection.🔽Then, recite:

original: de nas aom sarba dharm'a bh'a ba sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
analyzed: de nas aom sarba dharm'a bh'a ba sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
translated: oṃ sarva dharma svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

analyzed: zhes pas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur bsgom // de'i ngang @270a * //
translated: Meditate on all phenomena as being like space.

original: las rang gi rig pa h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar bar bsgom /
analyzed: las rang gi rig pa h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar bar bsgom /
translated: From within that state, meditate on your awareness as a dark-blue hūṃ, blazing intensely.

original: de gyur pa las rdo rje khro bo h'um gis mtshan par bsam /
analyzed: de gyur pa las rdo rje khro bo h'um gis mtshan par bsam /
translated: That transforms into a vajra marked with hūṃ.

analyzed: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mthing nag zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: From that arises the Bhagavat, the dark-blue Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka, with one face and three eyes.

original: khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa /
analyzed: khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa /
translated: His brow is furrowed with wrath.

original: mche ba gtsigs shing skra gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs shing skra gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: He bares his fangs and his hair bristles upward.

original: phyag g-yas kyis ral gri rdo rje'i yu ba can bzung ba /🔽g-yon sdigs mdzub autpalas mtshan pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas kyis ral gri rdo rje'i yu ba can bzung ba /🔽g-yon sdigs mdzub autpalas mtshan pa /
translated: He holds a sword with a vajra handle in his right hand.🔽His left hand makes a threatening gesture marked with an utpala.

original: gcer bu dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: gcer bu dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is naked and adorned with charnel ground ornaments.

original: yum rdo rje phag mo dang rol zhing ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
analyzed: yum rdo rje phag mo dang rol zhing ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
translated: He is in union with the mother Vajravarahi, and the fire of wisdom blazes.

original: ma he gdan du bting nas las kyi gshin rje 'dul bar bsgom /
analyzed: ma he gdan du bting nas las kyi gshin rje 'dul bar bsgom /
translated: He is seated on a water buffalo throne, subduing the karma yamas.🔽Light radiates from the heart of the principal figure, inviting the wisdom beings.

original: de'i thugs ka nas h'um las 'od 'phros pas de lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa dbul te /🔽aom badzra pushpe h'um /

translated: Nibidhye hum🔽Shabda hum

translated: Make the offerings and give the torma.

analyzed: gtor snod mi dmigs pa las rin po che'i snod du bsam /
translated: The torma vessel is visualized as a precious vessel from the state of emptiness.

original: h'um zhes brjod pas bdud rtsir bsam ;
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod pas bdud rtsir bsam ;
translated: Say hum and visualize it as nectar.

analyzed: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: Make supplications for the fulfillment of your wishes.

analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:sa dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya zhing /
translated: With ja hum bam hoh, invite the wisdom beings, and so forth.

original: yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs /
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs /
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind with the three syllables.

original: dbang bskur / mi skyo bar du bsgom /
analyzed: dbang bskur / mi skyo bar du bsgom /
translated: One should meditate on this until one is no longer weary.

original: de nas bzlas pa'i sngags 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas bzlas pa'i sngags 'di yin te /
translated: Then, this is the mantra for the recitation:

analyzed: a'om hr'i:shtri: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /

analyzed: zhes nam mkha'i dkyil nas thog babs pa ltar shin tu drag par bzlas so //

original: de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba /
analyzed: de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba /
translated: Then, the nature of illusion is luminosity,

original: zung du 'jug pa //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa //

analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa sems de la gtad pa'o //
translated: the vajra recitation, and the mind is focused on that.

original: nag po thugs kyi dpal be'u nas //

translated: From the glorious knot of the heart of the dark one,

original: zab mo bdud rtsi'i bcud thigs pas //
analyzed: zab mo bdud rtsi'i bcud thigs pas //
translated: the drop of the nectar of the profound,

original: skal ldan rin chen lta bu yi //
analyzed: skal ldan rin chen lta bu yi //
translated: the fortunate one who is like a jewel🔽will accomplish Mañjuśrī Yamāri.

analyzed: 'jam dpal gshin rje grub par shog /'jam dpal khor bor sgrub pa rje btsun ka ma la sh'i las mdzad pa rdzogs so//
